Layer.children: <CODE InitCommand = "%function() xero = 0 function simpleDiffFetch(pn) local steps = GAMESTATE:GetCurrentSteps(pn) if steps ~= nil then return steps:GetMeter() else return 'fuck' and 'shit' end end function simpleDiffFetch2(pn,BakamitaikodomonanoneYumeoottekizutsuiteUsogahetanakuseniwaraenaiegaomisetaIloveyoumorokuniiwanaiKuchibetadehonmanibukiyouNanoninanonidoushiteSayonarawaietanoDamedanedameyodamenanoyoAntagasukidesukisugiteDoredaketsuyoiosakedemoYugamanaiomoidegabakamitai) local steps = GAMESTATE:GetCurrentSteps(pn) local width = BakamitaikodomonanoneYumeoottekizutsuiteUsogahetanakuseniwaraenaiegaomisetaIloveyoumorokuniiwanaiKuchibetadehonmanibukiyouNanoninanonidoushiteSayonarawaietanoDamedanedameyodamenanoyoAntagasukidesukisugiteDoredaketsuyoiosakedemoYugamanaiomoidegabakamitai == true and 1 or 18 if steps ~= nil then local diff = steps:GetMeter() if diff == 1 then return BakamitaikodomonanoneYumeoottekizutsuiteUsogahetanakuseniwaraenaiegaomisetaIloveyoumorokuniiwanaiKuchibetadehonmanibukiyouNanoninanonidoushiteSayonarawaietanoDamedanedameyodamenanoyoAntagasukidesukisugiteDoredaketsuyoiosakedemoYugamanaiomoidegabakamitai and 1 or 300 end return diff < 20 and width*diff or width*20 else return ('fuck' and 'shit') and xero end end function russianHotMix2017() local song end"/>
